en: We have one hour left until the train's departure, don't you want to drop by the bookstore?
zh: 离火车出发还有一个小时，你想不想去书店逛逛？

en: Recently we seem to just keep missing each other. I never seem to be able to meet up with him.
zh: 最近我们好像总是错过。我总是碰不到他。

en: He is young.
She is young.
Tom doesn't know the difference between wine and champagne.
zh: 汤姆分不清葡萄酒和香槟。

en: Do you drink green tea?
Actually, I have no intention to quit right now.
zh: 实际上，我现在没有辞职的打算。

en: Actually, I have no intention of quitting right now.
zh: 实际上，我现在没有辞职的打算。

en: I've been way busier than expected.
I bought many books in Classical Japanese and I'm studying them, but it's hard, isn't it?
zh: 我买了很多古典日语的书，正在学习，但是很难，不是吗？

en: If I had you do this for me, wouldn't I then receive an essential understanding of the fundamentals?
zh: 如果我让你帮我做这件事，我不是就能对基本原理有一个本质的理解了吗？

en: I've received the admission ticket for the exam, but I haven't decided yet if I will go. I haven't studied at all.
zh: 我收到了考试的准考证，但我还没决定是否要去。我根本没复习。

en: That's a real one from a top brand.
I forgot to bring my book, so I'm free.
zh: 我忘了带书，所以现在很闲。

en: I'm listening to a Harry Potter audio book with the Walkman I just bought.
zh: 我正在用刚买的随身听听哈利波特有声书。

en: Is something bothering you?
He drank straight from the bottle.
I would give you the moon if I could.
zh: 如果可以，我愿意把月亮摘下来给你。

en: His house is small and moreover it's old.
I work on Sunday.
A lot of people think that bats are birds.
zh: 很多人认为蝙蝠是鸟类。

en: I think that I'm not academically oriented.
zh: 我觉得我不是学术型的。

en: There are some people who think that they can't write a novel because they lack the vocabulary.
zh: 有些人认为他们写不出小说是因为他们缺乏词汇量。

en: The thing I hate most about him is that he boasts of having had good grades in school despite not studying.
zh: 我最讨厌他的一点是，他明明没学习，却总是吹嘘自己以前在学校成绩很好。

en: I'm OK with having just one friend.
When did you pass the exam?
zh: 你什么时候通过考试的？

en: Their job is to shear the sheep.
zh: 他们的工作是给羊剪毛。

en: When did you take the exam?
zh: 你什么时候参加考试的？

en: Their job is to confuse learners of the language.
zh: 他们的工作是迷惑语言学习者。

en: Don't be fooled by her appearance.
The patient has no pulse.
Please reconsider.
The girl wore a light blue kimono.
zh: 那个女孩穿着一件浅蓝色的和服。

en: My daughter was in a light blue dress.
zh: 我的女儿穿着一件浅蓝色的连衣裙。

en: It's too risky.
What on earth is this?
Don't laugh.
Why don't we go somewhere together?
zh: 我们为什么不一起去哪里玩呢？

en: My mother is a lawyer.
I ate an Omurice.
I ate a Japanese rice omelette.
zh: 我吃了一个日式蛋包饭。

en: All the seats in this train are non-smoking.
zh: 这趟列车的所有座位都是禁烟的。

en: It is often said that Osaka is a city of commerce.
zh: 人们常说大阪是一个商业城市。

en: There's no entertainment in the countryside.
zh: 乡下没有什么娱乐活动。

en: There's no entertainment for young people around here.
zh: 这附近没有年轻人可以娱乐的活动。

en: I'm super hungry.
Would you like to have some tea?
She had a perfect alibi.
zh: 她有完美的不在场证明。

en: Would you like to eat some udon?
I like things like horumonyaki!
zh: 我喜欢像烤内脏之类的东西！

en: I like grilled offals!
Is this the Oosakayaki I hear about?
zh: 这就是我听说的大阪烧吗？

en: She said that she saw a suspicious man.
zh: 她说她看到一个可疑的男人。

en: Are Osakans greedy?
You must not give up.
This loaf of bread is big.
This loaf of bread is small.
My son thinks that bats are reptiles because they're like pteranodons.
zh: 我儿子认为蝙蝠是爬行动物，因为它们像翼龙。

en: I work on Sundays.
Laurie is twenty years old.
I am fond of Australian food.
zh: 我喜欢澳大利亚的食物。

en: The beach is an ideal place for children to have fun.
zh: 海滩是孩子们玩耍的理想场所。

en: Graduating from university without studying is a victory, isn't it.
zh: 不学习就大学毕业是一种胜利，不是吗。

en: I'm Turkish.
It's already 11 o'clock.
Do you have some dango?
Lately, I haven't been able to see him, we just pass by each other.
zh: 最近，我没能见到他，我们只是擦肩而过。

en: I don't smoke or drink. I just do pills.
zh: 我不抽烟也不喝酒。我只是吃药。

en: You should call the police.
I got such a terrible cold because of all the wind that the buildings cause.
zh: 因为建筑物引起的风，我得了很严重的感冒。

en: February has only 28 days.
Jessie is my most attractive friend.
zh: 杰西是我最有魅力的朋友。

en: He is not so much a translator as a poet.
zh: 与其说他是个翻译，不如说他是个诗人。

en: What's the meaning of life?
No, a dango is not a mochi.
No one will believe us.
I stayed at a nice hotel.
zh: 我住在一个不错的酒店。

en: He didn't want to talk about it further.
zh: 他不想再谈论这件事了。

en: I didn't know you had a cat.
No one cares.
I didn't know that you had a cat.
He can't tell a cherry tree from a plum tree, but he can name them in twelve languages.
zh: 他分不清樱桃树和李子树，但他能用十二种语言说出它们的名字。

en: After all, having an erection the entire day is strange, isn't it?
zh: 毕竟，一整天都勃起是很奇怪的，不是吗？

en: Why are you burning these pictures?
zh: 你为什么要烧这些照片？

en: It's hard to find a suitable translation.
She wants to be a tennis player when she grows up.
zh: 她长大后想成为一名网球运动员。

en: When I was in England, I used to swear much.
zh: 当我在英国的时候，我过去经常说脏话。

en: Every time I meet him, I swear at him.
zh: 每次我见到他，我都会骂他。

en: Can you translate this song for me?
zh: 你能帮我翻译这首歌吗？

en: Translate every line of this text.
zh: 翻译这段文字的每一行。

en: Don't smoke here.
Now, please, leave ... leave me alone!
zh: 现在，求你了，离开... 让我一个人待着！

en: What pains you, pains me too.
zh: 你的痛苦，也是我的痛苦。

en: I like when my friends translate my sentences.
zh: 我喜欢我的朋友翻译我的句子。

en: Are there people whose mother tongue is Esperanto?
zh: 有没有人的母语是世界语？

en: Have you ever heard someone speaking in Esperanto?
zh: 你有没有听过有人说世界语？

en: I like it when my friends translate my sentences.
zh: 我喜欢我的朋友翻译我的句子。

en: We walked up stairs.
The suspect is a black male.
zh: 嫌疑人是一名黑人男性。

en: The suspect is a caucasian female.
zh: 嫌疑人是一名白人女性。

en: It's true that Americans love pizza.
zh: 美国人确实很喜欢披萨。

en: The company's share price has fallen.
I rescued you.
I rescued him.
I rescued her.
I rescued the cat.
The moon is bright.
She has no children.
Nuclear power is safe.
I've never heard of him.
I've never heard of her.
I hate myself.
She hates herself.
He hates himself.
Yes, master.
It's all your fault.
This is nothing.
He's your friend.
She's your friend.
This is a mistake.
She's wet.
He's wet.
I'm wet.
The cat is wet.
I don't believe you.
We climbed the stairs.
He's rich, though unfriendly.
zh: 他很富有，但是不太友善。

en: The kitten slept soundly.
How do I use chopsticks?
A gentle breeze blew through the field.
The bee flew to the flower and drank the nectar.
zh: 蜜蜂飞到花上，吸食花蜜。

en: I'm sorry, but I have forgotten your name.
zh: 对不起，我忘了你的名字。

en: Like a lion attacking its prey, the kitten jumped on its toy.
zh: 像狮子扑向猎物一样，小猫跳到了它的玩具上。

en: I cry every time I watch this movie.
zh: 每次看这部电影我都会哭。

en: The bird sang in the tree.
When I was young, I would play near that river.
zh: 我小时候经常在那条河边玩。

en: Last week my grandmother turned 81 years old.
Do you have plans for next week?
Who teaches you German?
She brought me many novels in German.
zh: 她带给我很多德语小说。

en: Does your wife know German?
Do your children know German?
zh: 你的孩子们会说德语吗？

en: I want to speak in German with Arnold Schwarzenegger.
zh: 我想和阿诺·施瓦辛格用德语交谈。

en: I will introduce you some friends who study German.
zh: 我会介绍一些学习德语的朋友给你认识。

en: Is German pronunciation difficult?
German is not as difficult as Icelandic.
zh: 德语没有冰岛语那么难。

en: Spanish is much easier than German.
zh: 西班牙语比德语容易得多。

en: The teacher of German looked like a German woman.
zh: 我们的德语老师看起来像个德国女人。

en: Has our teacher been to Germany?
zh: 我们的老师去过德国吗？

en: I will try to translate more sentences into German.
zh: 我会尝试把更多的句子翻译成德语。

en: Armenian is an Indo-European language.
zh: 亚美尼亚语是一种印欧语系的语言。

en: Why did you want to go to Armenia?
zh: 你为什么想去亚美尼亚？

en: Are there a lot of foreigners in Armenia?
zh: 亚美尼亚有很多外国人吗？

en: Do you have any books about Armenia?
zh: 你有没有关于亚美尼亚的书？

en: When will you go to Armenia?
zh: 你什么时候去亚美尼亚？

en: Do you remember the earthquake that struck Armenia in 1988?
zh: 你还记得1988年袭击亚美尼亚的地震吗？

en: Are there many tourists in Armenia?
zh: 亚美尼亚有很多游客吗？

en: Show me your pictures in Armenia.
zh: 给我看看你在亚美尼亚的照片。

en: There is no sea in Armenia.
There are still people who are unable to read.
I'm eating here.
I don't know what I want.
I didn't know that there was this sort of place just on the route to the high school.
zh: 我不知道在去高中的路上竟然有这种地方。

en: There was someone sitting on a bench reading a book there.
zh: 有人坐在长凳上在那里看书。

en: When asking him if it was interesting, he showed a gentle smile and affirmed that there is no such thing as something interesting.
zh: 当问他是否有意思时，他露出温柔的微笑，并肯定地说没有什么有趣的东西。

en: As he walked away, his figure gradually became dim under the snow.
zh: 当他走开时，他的身影在雪中逐渐变得模糊。

en: At this rate, it's a matter of time before I get caught.
zh: 照这样下去，我被抓住只是时间问题。

en: We had a visitor when you were taking a shower.
zh: 你洗澡的时候，我们有客人来了。

en: The cup fell to the ground, shattering to pieces.
zh: 杯子掉在地上，摔成了碎片。

en: At the moment that I thought I was having a premonition, suddenly everything went black.
zh: 就在我以为自己有预感的那一刻，突然一切都变黑了。

en: Have you ever heard of Lucia Popp, who was a Slovakian opera singer?
zh: 你听说过露西娅·波普吗？她是一位斯洛伐克歌剧演唱家。

en: If you don't think of an excuse quickly, things will become awkward.
zh: 如果你不赶紧想个借口，事情会变得很尴尬。

en: There are probably few young people that like opera.
zh: 可能很少有年轻人喜欢歌剧。

en: How many people do you think live in Thailand?
zh: 你认为有多少人住在泰国？

en: As soon as I woke up, the headache returned.
zh: 我一醒来，头痛又回来了。

en: She works at the bank.
I need to work.
She interrupted me when I was speaking by putting her finger on my mouth.
zh: 我说话的时候，她用手指放在我的嘴上打断了我。

en: Is there life on Mars? If not, was it there before?
zh: 火星上有生命吗？如果没有，以前有过吗？

en: The curtains are fluttering in the wind.
Since then, you were in a state of stupor for two months.
zh: 从那以后，你昏迷了两个月。

en: Yup, it seems like even the doctor was about to throw the towel.
zh: 是的，看起来连医生都快要放弃了。

en: All day long today I have been waiting impatiently for you.
zh: 今天一整天我都在焦急地等你。

en: How sad it is to have a memory that you'll never be able to recall again.
zh: 拥有一段永远无法回忆的记忆是多么悲伤啊。

en: I'm waiting for her.
I lost my hat on the bus.
zh: 我在公共汽车上丢了帽子。

en: What is your favorite song?
Edith Piaf was a French singer.
zh: 伊迪丝·琵雅芙是一位法国歌手。

en: Little Peach Tree is from Germany.
This is not my home.
I choose my friends for their good looks, my acquaintances for their good characters, and my enemies for their intellects. A man cannot be too careful in the choice of his enemies.
zh: 我选择朋友看他们的外貌，选择熟人看他们的品格，选择敌人看他们的智慧。在选择敌人的时候，一个人再怎么小心也不为过。

en: I didn't want to add this hoodlum as a friend on Twitter.
zh: 我不想在推特上加这个流氓为好友。

en: Armenia joined the World Trade Organization in 2003.
zh: 亚美尼亚于2003年加入世界贸易组织。

en: I'm all right.
When was the last time you saw the cat?
zh: 你上次见到猫是什么时候？

en: It is those who want to do important things that are free.
zh: 只有那些想做重要事情的人才是自由的。

en: I did it for you.
Only one of the tires is extremely flat. I wonder if it was punctured by a nail or something.
zh: 只有一个轮胎完全没气了。我想知道是不是被钉子之类的东西扎破了。

en: Kabul is the capital of Afghanistan.
zh: 喀布尔是阿富汗的首都。

en: Is it hard to learn Esperanto?
I won't die.
I entered a coffee shop.
He has two women in his life.
They fought until the end.
Yesterday, the weather was very nice.
Algeria is a very important partner country for the European Union.
zh: 阿尔及利亚是欧盟非常重要的伙伴国家。

en: I will never forget that kind, loving woman.
zh: 我永远不会忘记那位善良、有爱心的女人。

en: You cannot live without water.
I am studying Chinese and Spanish.
zh: 我正在学习中文和西班牙语。

en: This is my son's CD.
People in other countries often say that the Japanese are not religious enough.
zh: 其他国家的人经常说日本人不够虔诚。

en: I'm really sorry to hear that.
zh: 听到这个消息我真的很抱歉。

en: When I don't have anything to say, I am not embarrassed to be quiet.
zh: 当我没什么可说的时候，我不怕安静。

en: Love is a comedy in France, a tragedy in England, an opera in Italy, and a melodrama in Germany.
zh: 爱情在法国是喜剧，在英国是悲剧，在意大利是歌剧，在德国是情节剧。

en: I don't think Tom is involved in that scandal.
zh: 我不认为汤姆卷入了那场丑闻。

en: I don't think that Tom was involved in the scandal.
zh: 我不认为汤姆卷入了那场丑闻。

en: Thank you for your concern about my mother and father.
They were happy when I told them.
zh: 当我告诉他们的时候，他们很高兴。

en: I can't do this.
If you cannot understand good advise, you cannot obey it.
zh: 如果你不能理解好的建议，你就不能遵守它。

en: The best way to understand a sentence is to translate it.
zh: 理解一个句子的最好方法是翻译它。

en: A smart falcon hides its talons.
zh: 聪明的猎鹰会隐藏它的爪子。

en: He who knows the most often says the least.
zh: 知道最多的人往往说得最少。

en: She is not afraid to die.
I like the smell of fresh bread.
zh: 我喜欢新鲜面包的味道。

en: We all want you to be happy.
I have watched all of her films.
This is Tom's dirty little secret.
zh: 这是汤姆不可告人的小秘密。

en: I'm not angry!
Just look at him.
There are two slices of pizza for each person.
She is completely absorbed in a book.
zh: 她完全沉浸在一本书里。

en: The patient is in a state of profound stupor.
zh: 病人处于深度昏迷状态。

en: I didn't mean to startle you.
The patient is in a deep coma.
Look!
Mari calls her library room her "meditation room."
zh: 玛丽称她的图书室为“冥想室”。

en: The best way to convince a fool that he is wrong is to let him have his way.
zh: 说服一个傻瓜承认自己错了的最好方法就是让他为所欲为。

en: We are making progress.
She's making progress.
Is it important?
Scorpions are dangerous.
Don't waste your pocket money.
That's a stupid question!
What's done can't be undone.
Sorry for bothering you at this busy time.
zh: 对不起，在这个繁忙的时候打扰你。

en: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.
zh: 免我们的债，如同我们免了人的债。

en: And forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive those who trespass against us.
zh: 饶恕我们的过犯，如同我们饶恕冒犯我们的人。

en: And forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive them that trespass against us.
zh: 饶恕我们的过犯，如同我们饶恕那些得罪我们的人。

en: What is wabisabi?
What is a space elevator?
Are you a Filipino?
Jupiter is very large.
Look at Venus!
We live in the Milky Way galaxy.
I went shopping at the new convenience store that opened in the neighborhood and received a free gift of bread.
zh: 我去附近新开的便利店买了东西，还免费赠送了面包。

en: Would you like black tea or coffee?
Did you know that he is good at making coffee?
zh: 你知道他很会煮咖啡吗？

en: I drank too much coffee today.
The doctor prescribed it for her.
Because of the rain, the picnic was held in the gymnasium.
zh: 因为下雨，野餐改在体育馆举行。

en: I don't like Easter eggs.
Don't grow up. It's a trap!
zh: 不要长大。这是一个陷阱！

en: I want to change the world.
Keep reading.
Singapore is called "Xīnjiāpō" in Chinese.
zh: 新加坡在中文里叫做“新加坡”。

en: There is no other way.
I'm not a hero.
I love eggplant.
As we age, our ability to remember gets worse.
zh: 随着年龄的增长，我们的记忆力会变差。

en: How much do you love me?
The black kitten hopped to avoid the puddle, and passed under the neighbouring hedge.
zh: 黑色的小猫跳了一下，避开水坑，然后从旁边的树篱下穿过。

en: I wonder what you're looking at.
Love is crazy.
I'm all shook up!
I'm very excited.
Eh, do you know where the nail clippers that were here before are?
zh: 欸，你知道之前放在这儿的指甲刀去哪儿了吗？

en: I am praying the time passes quickly.
After the death of my father, it became clear that my mother was incompetent at handling the family finances.
zh: 我父亲去世后，我才清楚地意识到我母亲不善于处理家庭财务。

en: My sister is my sister. I am who I am.
zh: 我妹妹就是我妹妹，我就是我。

en: Tatoeba is the website I use when I don't find enough examples in dictionaries.
zh: 当我在字典里找不到足够的例句时，Tatoeba就是我使用的网站。

en: How many times do I have to tell you that Tatoeba is not a human being?
zh: 我得告诉你多少遍，Tatoeba不是人？

en: He apparently dates a Japanese girl called Tatoeba.
zh: 他好像在和一个叫Tatoeba的日本女孩约会。

en: No Japanese girl is called Tatoeba.
He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know.
Moreover, because he was handsome, he was ill-suited to working as a teacher in a girls' school.
zh: 而且，因为他长得很帅，所以他不适合在女子学校当老师。

en: When the sisters came back, their mother was still awake.
zh: 姐妹们回来的时候，她们的母亲还没睡。

en: I would just like to thank all of you for your work.
zh: 我只想感谢你们所有人的工作。

en: I would just like to thank you for translating my sentences.
zh: 我只想感谢你翻译我的句子。

en: The prisoners tried to escape.
I did not have sexual relations with that woman.
zh: 我没有和那个女人发生性关系。

en: I must wait here.
I can go there on foot.
I like the bright colors.
How many teachers of Spanish are there at this high school?
zh: 这所高中里有多少西班牙语老师？

en: How many cars are there in the United States?
If you are up for it, let's go!
zh: 如果你准备好了，我们走吧！

en: A drop in the bucket.
I also feel more at ease when my wife is not around.
zh: 当我的妻子不在身边时，我也感到更自在。

en: No, the life that a man and a woman build together is rarely happy, don't you think?
zh: 不，男人和女人共同建立的生活很少是幸福的，你不觉得吗？

en: You love children, don't you?
My wife doesn't seem to like even her own children.
zh: 我妻子好像连自己的孩子都不喜欢。

en: The children were completely soaked.
May I ask why?
"Let the English and the French take all the land they want," said the Indian chief. "But they want to take all the land between the Atlantic Ocean to the Pacific Ocean, is it OK?" said Tom.
zh: “让英国人和法国人拿走他们想要的所有土地吧，”印第安酋长说。“但是他们想要拿走从大西洋到太平洋之间的所有土地，可以吗？”汤姆说。

en: How did they come here?
He doesn't know who he should ask.
Do they both understand Japanese?
Do you go there often?
Why am I so tired?
We have a lot of friends.
Please keep it a secret.
Please don't tell anyone.
Please don't tell anyone!
All the children fell asleep before it got dark.
zh: 所有的孩子都在天黑前睡着了。

en: The cold spell slowed the growth of the rice plants.
zh: 寒流减缓了水稻的生长。

en: The company decided to hire two new secretaries.
zh: 公司决定雇用两名新秘书。

en: He traveled by boat.
They translated the novel from Russian into Armenian.
zh: 他们把小说从俄语翻译成亚美尼亚语。

en: French bread is delicious.
Fire!
I'm going to sign up for a German class right now.
zh: 我现在就去报名参加德语课。

en: Tom couldn't swim.
He is going to be a father soon.
I'm a terrible swimmer.
I'm not a good swimmer.
I love Aimer's music.
I'm working right now.
Tom has already eaten.
Tom has never eaten raw horse meat.
zh: 汤姆从来没有吃过生马肉。

en: Tom hasn't been able to eat solid food since his accident.
zh: 自从事故发生后，汤姆一直无法吃固体食物。

en: Tom said that he'd never eaten such a delicious meal before.
zh: 汤姆说他以前从未吃过这么美味的一餐。

en: Tom seldom eats seafood.
Tom used to eat a lot of junk food.
zh: 汤姆过去常常吃很多垃圾食品。

en: Tom was eating his dessert when the phone rang.
zh: 电话铃响的时候，汤姆正在吃甜点。

en: You should eat a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables.
zh: 你应该吃各种新鲜的水果和蔬菜。

en: When you eat pancakes, how many do you usually eat?
zh: 你吃薄煎饼的时候，通常吃几个？

en: What's the most interesting thing you ate on your trip?
zh: 你在旅行中吃过的最有趣的东西是什么？

en: What're you eating?
What did you eat?
There were some men eating their lunches under the trees in front of the library.
zh: 图书馆前，有些人在树下吃午饭。

en: The last time I ate at that restaurant the food wasn't very good.
zh: 我上次在那家餐馆吃饭的时候，食物不太好吃。

en: Some people think that eating grapefruit with every meal will help you lose weight.
zh: 有些人认为每餐都吃葡萄柚可以帮助你减肥。

en: Since it was raining, we had to eat our picnic lunch indoors.
zh: 因为下雨，我们不得不在室内吃我们的野餐午餐。

en: My children had eaten all the cookies by the time I got home.
zh: 我回家的时候，我的孩子们已经把所有的饼干都吃光了。

en: Most of us don't eat a balanced diet.
zh: 我们大多数人都没有均衡的饮食。

en: Let's eat lunch outside.
I wish I could've eaten at that restaurant with you.
zh: 我真希望我能和你一起在那家餐馆吃饭。

en: I usually don't have time to eat a large lunch.
zh: 我通常没有时间吃一顿丰盛的午餐。

en: I had just finished eating lunch when my doorbell rang.
zh: 我刚吃完午饭，门铃就响了。

en: I enjoy eating with you.
I don't want to eat anything.
I don't often eat deep-fried food.
I don't eat green peppers at all.
Horses eat grass.
The young man's face became even redder.
zh: 那个年轻人的脸变得更红了。

en: The young woman's face became even redder.
zh: 那个年轻女人的脸变得更红了。

en: Her mother knew that her eldest daughter had signed up for a drama seminar, but she had no idea that she was so deeply involved as to appear on stage.
zh: 她妈妈知道她的大女儿报名参加了一个戏剧研讨会，但她不知道她会如此投入，甚至要上台表演。

en: The foreigners are having a tennis tournament. Do you want to go?
zh: 那些外国人在举行网球比赛。你想去吗？

en: The foreigners are having a tennis tournament. Would you like to come and watch it?
zh: 那些外国人在举行网球比赛。你想来看吗？

en: Kotaro found a large swallowtail butterfly and chased him about 20 meters inside the grass field.
zh: 太郎发现了一只大的凤尾蝶，在草地上追了它大约20米。

en: I'm working on it.
Can I touch it?
She laughed and gave me a playful shove.
zh: 她笑着轻轻推了我一下。

en: What is she up to?
What is the cat up to?
The problem is that solar energy just costs too much.
zh: 问题是太阳能的成本太高了。

en: Mayuko doesn't get enough sleep.
What do you want for your birthday?
How did you know his name wasn't Tom?
zh: 你怎么知道他的名字不是汤姆？

en: Even though the light was red, that car just drove right through.
zh: 即使是红灯，那辆车还是直接开过去了。

en: He put the book on the desk.
Frankly speaking, he's wrong.
To put it bluntly, he's mistaken.
There is a toy shop in the neighborhood.
They look similar in some ways.
zh: 他们在某些方面看起来很相似。

en: I saw this movie a very long time ago.
zh: 这部电影是很久以前看的了。

en: When a man opens the door of a car for a woman, either the woman is new, or the car.
zh: 当一个男人为女人打开车门时，要么是女人是新的，要么是车是新的。

en: Let's pretend this never happened.
zh: 就当我们没发生过这件事。

en: Don't do anything stupid.
Tom said that it probably wouldn't take too much time.
zh: 汤姆说这可能不会花太多时间。

en: Tom was a professional gambler before he met Mary.
zh: 汤姆在遇到玛丽之前是个职业赌徒。

en: I'd be delighted if you could come with us.
zh: 如果你能和我们一起来，我会很高兴的。

en: I'd be happy if you could come with us.
zh: 如果你能和我们一起来，我会很高兴的。

en: I'd be delighted to sing for you.
I'd be delighted if they asked me to give a speech.
zh: 如果他们邀请我发表演讲，我会很高兴的。

en: I'd be depressed if they asked me to quit the team.
zh: 如果他们让我退出球队，我会很沮丧的。

en: It would be great if you could join us for dinner.
zh: 如果你能和我们一起吃晚饭，那就太好了。

en: We'd be happy if you could come with us.
zh: 如果你能和我们一起来，我们会很高兴的。

en: I'd be happy to sing for you.
Nope, not at all.
My mother gave me a sewing machine.
zh: 我妈妈给了我一台缝纫机。

en: Did you ask Tom?
Have you ever been inside Tom's house?
I can't take it anymore.
I didn't say that.
I'm going to give you one more chance.
That sounds great.
Tom had a rough day at work.
zh: 汤姆今天工作不太顺利。

en: Tom has a pretty good memory.
Tom tucked his shirt into his pants.
zh: 汤姆把衬衫塞进了裤子里。

en: What are you drinking?
What do you think, Tom?
Where did you hear that?
Who are you going with?
Who gave you this?
Thanks for the comment.
I ate fish yesterday.
Hurry home.
Pace yourself.
Read this now.
Release him.
Take the garbage out.
Wait here.
Tom is out in the garden.
Tom is not happy.
Tom hates to get his feet wet.
Is Tom doing okay?
Do you know where Tom is?
You do that and I'll fire you.
Where've you been?
Where are my parents?
Nobody knows.
My eyes are burning.
My daughter was taken away from me.
My children were taken away from me.
Mary's my niece.
Mary's in there.
Mary's confused.
Mary likes you.
Make the new guy do it.
Lower your voice.
Let's talk about this later.
Let's take the short cut.
Let's put it to a vote.
Let's hit the showers.
Is anyone hurt?
I'll help you pack.
I'll get back to you.
I don't understand it.
I believed you.
I appreciate it.
Do you have some wine?
Can you hear us?
Anybody could do this.
Would you like to play tennis every Sunday?
zh: 你愿意每个星期天都打网球吗？

en: Leave me some ice cream.
Give me a hug.
Don't make a sound.
Don't say anything.
Tom has a dog named Cookie.
zh: 汤姆有一只名叫库奇的狗。

en: Tell me what Tom said.
Let me pay for your coffee.
Don't read my diary.
Don't look at me.
The Japanese embassy has warned Japanese citizens to be careful.
zh: 日本大使馆已警告日本公民要小心。

en: I hope they can reach a peaceful compromise.
zh: 我希望他们能达成和平妥协。

en: Tom has been living out of a suitcase for the past two months.
zh: 在过去的两个月里，汤姆一直住在行李箱里。

en: I'm supposed to eat with Tom this evening.
zh: 我今晚应该和汤姆一起吃饭。

en: If you eat that, Tom will be angry.
zh: 如果你吃了那个，汤姆会生气的。

en: The doctor told Tom to stop eating dog food.
zh: 医生告诉汤姆不要再吃狗粮了。

en: Tom and Mary ate a six-course meal together.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽一起吃了一顿六道菜的晚餐。

en: Tom ate a piece of the cake that Mary baked.
zh: 汤姆吃了一块玛丽烤的蛋糕。

en: Tom ate a quick lunch.
Tom ate his fill.
Tom ate your candy.
Tom has only fifteen minutes to eat his lunch.
zh: 汤姆只有十五分钟的时间吃午饭。

en: Tom has some food allergies, so he has to be careful about what he eats.
zh: 汤姆对一些食物过敏，所以他必须小心他吃的东西。

en: Tom is having an allergic reaction to something he ate.
zh: 汤姆对吃的东西产生了过敏反应。

en: When Tom gets drunk, he'll eat a lot of things that he wouldn't eat when he's sober.
zh: 当汤姆喝醉时，他会吃很多他清醒时不会吃的东西。

en: You should eat.
If you don't want it, I'll eat it.
zh: 如果你不想要，我就吃掉它。

en: I can't decide where to eat lunch.
zh: 我无法决定在哪里吃午饭。

en: I can't believe you're eating what the doctor told you not to eat.
zh: 我真不敢相信你竟然在吃医生告诉你不要吃的东西。

en: I already ate.
If you tell a lie, Lord Emma will rip out your tongue.
zh: 如果你说谎，艾玛大人会拔掉你的舌头。

en: Happy when borrowing, but upset when having to return it.
zh: 借的时候开心，还的时候不高兴。

en: A person will have the face of an angel when borrowing something, but the face of the devil when returning it.
zh: 借东西的时候像天使，还东西的时候像魔鬼。

en: I'm the middle child of three.
zh: 我是三个孩子中的老二。

en: I'm the second oldest of three children.
zh: 我是三个孩子中第二大的。

en: Don't look at me like that.
Elephants can't ride bicycles.
I like the Tatoeba logo.
Tom refused to follow Mary's advice.
zh: 汤姆拒绝听玛丽的建议。

en: Show yourself.
Don't touch me.
Don't follow me.
Cut that out!
Why should I go to school?
She's an angel.
I didn't do anything!
He had the last laugh.
Tell Tom I said hi.
Say cheese.
Show me your passport.
Hug me.
Do you know that elephants have two enormous ears, but they still can't understand you?
zh: 你知道大象有两只巨大的耳朵，但它们仍然听不懂你在说什么吗？

en: She's not a regular employee of this company.
zh: 她不是这家公司的正式员工。

en: She's not a full-time employee of this company.
zh: 她不是这家公司的全职员工。

en: Tom has a history of drug abuse.
On school nights, Tom goes to bed at nine o'clock, but on Fridays and Saturdays, he stays up much later.
zh: 在平时的上学日，汤姆九点睡觉，但是星期五和星期六，他会熬夜到很晚。

en: Do you have the latest version?
My new phone is thinner than my old phone.
zh: 我的新手机比我的旧手机薄。

en: He's married to an American woman.
I'm not sure if he saw it.
zh: 我不确定他是否看到了。

en: I'm not sure when Tom will leave.
zh: 我不确定汤姆什么时候会离开。

en: I'm not sure what Tom will do.
zh: 我不确定汤姆会做什么。

en: It's very interesting.
I need a new car.
Do you still love her?
Do you still love him?
He still loves her.
He likes country music.
We can't turn back.
I'm sorry I hurt you.
Do you like my new haircut?
Shinji ate nine coconuts.
Please read the text below.
Why are you not doing it?
"You know Tom, don't you?" "I can't say that I do."
zh: “你认识汤姆，不是吗？”“我不能说我认识。”

en: "Would you like a drink?" "I've already got one."
zh: “你想喝点什么吗？”“我已经有了一杯。”

en: "Where's Tom?" "How would I know?"
"Let's buy Tom a car for his graduation present." "That's a great idea."
zh: “我们给汤姆买辆车作为他的毕业礼物吧。”“真是个好主意。”

en: "Let me get you a cup of coffee." "I'd appreciate that."
zh: “我给你倒一杯咖啡吧。”“我会很感激的。”

en: "I hear Tom and Mary are getting a divorce." "That's the rumor."
zh: “我听说汤姆和玛丽要离婚了。”“传言是这么说的。”

en: "I have to stop you from doing that." "Stop me from doing what?"
zh: “我必须阻止你做那件事。”“阻止我做什么？”

en: "I can't figure this out." "That makes two of us."
"How much money does Tom make?" "How would I know?"
zh: “汤姆挣多少钱？”“我怎么会知道？”

en: "Are you going to Tom's party?" "I'm still not sure."
zh: “你要去参加汤姆的派对吗？”“我还没确定。”

en: Hello.
I always drink a glass of milk before going to sleep.
zh: 我总是睡前喝一杯牛奶。

en: Don't worry. Tom will be fine.
Don't worry. It's easy.
Don't worry. I'll protect you.
Don't worry. I won't tell anyone.
zh: 别担心。我不会告诉任何人的。

en: Don't worry. I won't hurt her.
zh: 别担心。我不会伤害她的。

en: Don't worry about Tom. He isn't a threat.
zh: 别担心汤姆。他没有威胁。

en: Don't worry about me so much.
Don't worry about it. Everything's going to be fine.
zh: 别担心。一切都会好起来的。

en: Don't waste your time.
Don't waste Tom's time.
Don't wait for me for dinner.
Don't touch my stuff.
Don't tell anyone.
Don't talk to Tom about this.
Don't talk to me.
Don't sass me.
Don't move unless I tell you.
zh: 除非我告诉你，否则别动。

en: Don't make me hurt you.
Don't make a scene.
Don't let Tom talk to anyone.
zh: 别让汤姆和任何人说话。

en: Don't leave town.
Don't just stand there. Get in my car.
Don't go there now.
Don't get paranoid.
Don't forget your bag.
Don't forget our date tomorrow.
zh: 别忘了我们明天的约会。

en: Don't flatter yourself.
Don't feel bad. Tom didn't give me a present either.
zh: 别难过。汤姆也没给我礼物。

en: Don't drink that.
Don't do this.
Don't do anything stupid, OK?
Don't burst my bubble.
Don't beat yourself up.
Don't be so lazy.
Don't be rude.
Don't be mean.
Don't be mad at me.
Don't act surprised.
Tell Tom to stop following me around.
zh: 告诉汤姆别再跟着我了。

en: Tell Tom I won't need his help.
zh: 告诉汤姆我不需要他的帮助。

en: Tell Tom I won't be needing his help.
zh: 告诉汤姆我不需要他的帮助。

en: Tell Tom I love him.
Tell Tom about what you did the other night.
zh: 告诉汤姆你那天晚上做了什么。

en: Tell me who you plan to go to Boston with.
zh: 告诉我你计划和谁一起去波士顿。

en: Tell me what you saw.
Tell me again who will be helping us.
zh: 再告诉我一遍谁会帮助我们。

en: Tell me again where you live.
zh: 再告诉我一遍你住在哪里。

en: Tell me about Tom.
Take the leftover food home with you.
Take care of Tom.
Take a seat. You look tired.
Take a deep breath and relax.
Stop the car.
Stop pretending you don't know the answer.
zh: 别再装作你不知道答案了。

en: Stop calling me Tom.
Stop badgering me.
Lighten up.
Let me take a gander.
Let me see that list.
Let me know if you need anything.
zh: 如果你需要什么，告诉我。

en: Let me help.
Let me call you back.
Let me ask you a question.
Leave my family alone.
Leave me alone or I'll call the police.
zh: 别烦我，不然我就报警了。

en: Leave a message and I'll call you.
zh: 请留言，我会给你回电话。

en: Keep your voice down.
Keep your mouth shut.
Keep your hands off my stuff.
Just use mine for now.
Just tell me what you're looking for.
zh: 告诉我你在找什么就行。

en: Just tell me what you know about Tom.
zh: 告诉我你知道关于汤姆的什么就行。

en: Just tell me what you know about the situation.
zh: 告诉我你知道关于情况的什么就行。

en: Just tell me what you know about the problem.
zh: 告诉我你知道关于问题的什么就行。

en: Just leave Tom alone.
Just keep your mind on your work.
Just close your eyes.
Just answer the question.
Go home. Get some rest.
Go get some towels.
Go find somebody who can help.
Go back to work.
Find out where Tom is.
Do it quickly.
Call me when you're ready.
zh: 你准备好了就给我打电话。

en: Call me when it's done.
There is a fly buzzing in front of the fish shop.
zh: 鱼店前面有只苍蝇嗡嗡叫。

en: This was her first job.
His parents love me.
I am a nurse.
The women achieved their goal.
zh: 女人们实现了她们的目标。

en: Tom gave all the money he had to Mary.
zh: 汤姆把他所有的钱都给了玛丽。

en: It's easier to make money when you already have some.
zh: 当你已经有钱的时候，赚钱更容易。

en: We don't know why there's more matter than antimatter.
zh: 我们不知道为什么正物质比反物质多。

en: The pen I lost yesterday was new.
zh: 我昨天丢的那支笔是新的。

en: Would you help me clean the bedroom?
Get a grip on yourself!
The life span of a butterfly is short.
How can we achieve a balance between work and personal life?
zh: 我们怎样才能在工作和个人生活之间取得平衡？

en: No smoking!
Tom would never do that.
Tom won't listen.
Tom will take you home.
Tom will not let Mary go.
Tom will have to wait.
Tom will be thrilled.
Tom will be there.
Tom watched Mary put sugar in her coffee.
zh: 汤姆看着玛丽往咖啡里加糖。

en: Tom was wearing a mask to conceal his identity.
zh: 汤姆戴着面具来掩盖他的身份。

en: Tom was the only one hurt.
Tom was supposed to meet me at 2:30.
zh: 汤姆本应该在两点半和我见面。

en: Tom was smart not to sell his house at that time.
zh: 汤姆当时没有卖掉他的房子是很明智的。

en: Tom was quite handsome when he was young.
Tom was my hero.
Tom was listening to his iPod as he worked out.
zh: 汤姆锻炼的时候正在听他的iPod。

en: Tom was in his underwear.
Tom was holding a small box in his hands.
zh: 汤姆手里拿着一个小盒子。

en: Tom was gunned down in the street in front of the church.
zh: 汤姆在教堂前的街上被枪杀了。

en: Tom was chewing on a toothpick.
Tom was born premature.
Tom was arrested.
Tom was about to leave when Mary knocked on the door.
zh: 汤姆正要离开，玛丽就敲门了。

en: Tom was a very funny man.
zh: 汤姆是个非常幽默的人。

en: Tom wants to talk to you.
Tom wants to play.
Tom wants to help.
Tom wants to get married.
Tom wants me to apologize.
Tom wanted to see Mary.
Tom walked through the door.
Tom walked over to the desk.
Tom walked into Mary's room.
zh: 汤姆走进了玛丽的房间。

en: Tom walked in the room.
Tom used to dream of playing professional baseball.
zh: 汤姆过去常常梦想打职业棒球。

en: Tom used to be our handyman.
zh: 汤姆以前是我们的杂工。

en: Tom used to bake us cookies.
zh: 汤姆过去常常给我们烤饼干。

en: Tom unlocked the front gate.
Tom typed in the password.
Tom turned pale.
Tom turned on the light.
Tom turned off the water.
Tom tried to stay calm.
Tom tried to pick up his keys with his toes.
zh: 汤姆试图用脚趾捡起钥匙。

en: Tom tried to open the door.
Tom tried not to hurt Mary.
Tom took the bottle of Scotch from his briefcase and handed it to Mary.
zh: 汤姆从公文包里拿出那瓶苏格兰威士忌，递给了玛丽。

en: Tom took off his shirt.
Tom took a blanket off the bed and wrapped it around himself.
zh: 汤姆从床上拿下一条毯子，裹在自己身上。

en: Tom told Mary to go home.
Tom threatened me. He said if I didn't give him the money, he'd cut off one of my fingers.
zh: 汤姆威胁我。他说如果我不给他钱，他会切掉我的一根手指。

en: Tom taught me how to cook.
Tom tapped on the window.
Tom stopped running and tried to catch his breath.
zh: 汤姆停止跑步，试图喘口气。

en: Tom stood up and walked to the window.
zh: 汤姆站起来，走到窗户旁。

en: Tom stood up and headed for the door.
Tom stepped off the train.
Tom stepped forward to kiss Mary, but she stepped back.
zh: 汤姆向前一步想亲吻玛丽，但她退后了。

en: Tom started to unbutton his shirt.
zh: 汤姆开始解开他的衬衫扣子。

en: Tom slammed down the phone.
zh: 汤姆砰地一声挂断了电话。

en: Tom sits at his computer eight hours a day.
zh: 汤姆每天坐在电脑前八个小时。

en: Tom showed up at the party wearing a suit and tie.
zh: 汤姆穿着西装和领带出现在派对上。
